mdRecord.dcterms:description: Riviera Park was originally constructed from 1912 to 1935 to house the first Normal School in Santa Barbara and later became the campus of Santa Barbara College, prior to its current iteration, the University of California Santa Barbara. -- https://www.towbes.com/riviera-park/ [work]
